overview: Jaco Pastorius Trilogue with Albert Mangelsdorff and Alphonse Mouzon.  Recorded live at the Berlin Jazz Days, 6 November 1976 at the Berlin Philharmonic.  Albert Mangelsdorff – trombone, Alphonse Mouzon – drums, Jaco Pastorius ‎– bass  1) Foreign Fun  2) Accidental Meeting  3) Zores Mores  4) Trilogue  5) Portrait Of Tracy  6) Trio Song  7) Ant Steps on an Elephant's Toe
title: Jaco Pastorius: Trilogue Live 1976
